fields.title: Lalpurja (Land Certificate)
fields.description: 5 Aana land ownership certificate from Land Revenue Office

fields.title: Tax Clearance (Tiro Rasid)
fields.description: Property tax clearance certificate from municipality

fields.title: Site Survey Report
fields.description: Field verification report by Surveyor Ram Kumar Khadka

fields.title: Charkilla (Boundary Map)
fields.description: Land boundary map with neighbor signatures

fields.title: Structural Design
fields.description: Structural engineering drawings by Er. Dinesh Sharma

fields.title: Site Board Photo
fields.description: Photo of permit board displayed at construction site

fields.title: 1. Darta / Chalani (File Registration)
fields.description: Submit application file at Tulsipur Sub-Metropolitan City Engineering Section with: Lalpurja (Land Certificate), Citizenship, Tax Clearance (Tiro Rasid), Site Plan, and Architectural Drawings.
fields.notes: File No: TSM/ENG/2024/001. Submitted at Ward Office No. 6.

fields.title: 2. Jaminko Nap Jaach (Field Verification)
fields.description: Municipal Surveyor (Amin) visits site to verify land boundaries (Charkilla), measure actual area, and confirm setback requirements as per Tulsipur building bylaws.
fields.notes: Surveyor: Ram Kumar Khadka. Verified 5 Aana land. Setback: 5ft front, 3ft sides confirmed.

fields.title: 3. Naksa Jaach (Blueprint Verification)
fields.description: Structural Engineer reviews architectural and structural drawings for compliance with Nepal National Building Code (NBC) and local bylaws. Checks load calculations, foundation design, and safety measures.
fields.notes: Approved by Er. Dinesh Sharma (License No: 8765-Civil). Minor corrections made to staircase width.

fields.title: 4. Rajaswa Bhuktani (Revenue Payment)
fields.description: Pay construction tax/revenue to Municipality Treasury based on building area (Rs. 150 per sq.ft for residential). Includes: Building Permit Fee, Sanitation Fee, and Development Charge.
fields.notes: Total Paid: Rs. 45,000 (2500 sqft × Rs. 18/sqft). Receipt No: TSM/REV/2024/0089

fields.title: 5. Asthayi Nirman Ijajat (Temporary Construction Permit)
fields.description: Permission to begin foundation work up to Plinth/DPC level. Valid for 3 months. Must display permit board at site entrance.
fields.notes: Permit No: TSM/2024/001. Valid until 2024-05-01. Site board installed.

fields.title: 6. DPC Level Jaach (Plinth Level Inspection)
fields.description: Municipal Engineer inspects foundation, plinth height (minimum 18 inches above ground), and verifies setbacks before allowing superstructure construction.
fields.notes: Inspection scheduled for 2024-03-05. Engineer: Er. Prakash Thapa

fields.title: 7. Sthayi Nirman Ijajat (Permanent Construction Permit)
fields.description: Final approval to build superstructure (columns, beams, slabs) after successful DPC inspection. Includes approval for roofing and finishing work.

fields.title: 8. Slab Casting Jaach (Floor Slab Inspection)
fields.description: Optional inspection at each floor level to verify column alignment, beam reinforcement, and slab thickness as per approved drawings.
fields.notes: Required for buildings above 3 floors or commercial structures

fields.title: 9. Nirman Sampanna Praman Patra (Completion Certificate)
fields.description: Final inspection after construction completion. Verifies building matches approved Naksa, proper drainage, fire safety, and structural integrity. Required for electricity and water connection.
fields.notes: Apply within 6 months of construction completion. Fee: Rs. 5,000

fields.title: 10. Occupancy Certificate (Basne Swikrit)
fields.description: Final clearance from Municipality certifying building is safe for occupation. Required for property registration and bank loan documentation.
fields.notes: Issued after Completion Certificate and utility connections
